column6:
Not in this issue: The Nextwave squad runs a marathon! Who wins? Who loses? Who crawls over the finish line? Also, they drink lots of Bromo-Fizz!,2006,9
In this issue: Oh, no! The Mindless Ones are loose in an American Town and only Nextwave can stop them! Watch people get kicked and things explode!
Isn't what happens more exciting than what doesn't happen? LIFE IS GREAT!
32 PGS./Parental Advisory ...$2.99
column8: | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | writer:Warren Ellis | inker:Wade von Grawbadger | penciller (cover):Stuart Immonen | colorist:Dave McCaig
